ValidationRule.description: Valid for Client claims - In order to change case owner, user must have Case Manager or Client Ombudsman permission set.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ( NOT($Permission.ClaimCaseManager ) && NOT($Permission.ClientOmbudsman ) ), ISCHANGED(OwnerId) , CONTAINS ('|NewClientClaim|ClientClaimConfirmationSent|', '|' + RecordType.DeveloperName + '|') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to change owner for client claims.
